transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji Sanjay ji, IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu main aapke saath. Good morning sir kaise hain aap?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ji ji theek thaak. Haan sir kal wo maine jo aapko buyleads batai thi usse baat hui aapki?
Customer: Message vgera to daal diya photo vgera daal diya maine unhone ok karke bol diya agar requirement rahi to bata dunga aage.
Executive: Achha achha ok. Bangalore wale se baat nahi hui hai jo dusra wala tha unse baat hui aapki hai na?
Customer: Haan dono ka ok mein reply aaya tha mere paas.
Executive: Achha achha dono ka reply aa gaya chaliye badhiya theek hai. Along with that aapka ab granite vgera ke regarding mujhe aur aapke saath buyleads batani thi hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap please portal open karenge sir IndiaMART ka?
Customer: Abhi pahucha nahi mujhe 10-15 minute lagenge abhi.
Executive: Achha ji. Koi baat nahi jaise hi aap pahunch jaate hain na aap mujhe whatsapp pe ek baar text kar dijiyega main aapko call back karungi theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Tab tak main aapke search kar leti hu alright?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai ok.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to discuss granite buyleads.

- Customer needs 10-15 minutes to open portal.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back after customer texts.

- Executive will search for buyleads meanwhile.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will text on WhatsApp after reaching.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, granite, portal, follow-up
